alert.note: Alert for Gibson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 10:02PM EST until March 16 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... Patoka River near Princeton. .Recent heavy rainfall in the Patoka River basin has caused the river to rise. At Princeton, the river is forecast to crest in minor flooding late this week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY, MARCH 16... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Patoka River near Princeton. * WHEN...Until Wednesday, March 16. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM CST Monday the stage was 18.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.8 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday, March 15. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
